projectList.title: UChat
projectList.subTitle: High-Scale Secure Messaging Platform
projectList.description: A high-performance messaging app built with Clean Architecture. Features End-to-End Encryption (E2EE), ISAR Database for offline-first capabilities, secure authentication, and real-time VoIP via LiveKit.

projectList.title: SkinX
projectList.subTitle: Thailand's Leading Telemedicine App
projectList.description: Leading telemedicine platform with 800k+ downloads. Engineered real-time consultations via Agora and implemented secure e-commerce flows with integrated payment gateways.

projectList.title: SkinX (Doctor App)
projectList.subTitle: Specialized Healthcare Delivery Platform
projectList.description: A dedicated dermatology platform empowering practitioners to deliver seamless care. Features flexible teleconsultation scheduling, secure professional-patient connectivity, and integrated workflows for medical summaries and electronic prescriptions.

projectList.title: SkinX Landing
projectList.subTitle: Official Product Website
projectList.description: High-traffic landing page for SkinX, optimized for performance, SEO, and cross-device compatibility using modern web technologies.

projectList.title: SkinX Doctor
projectList.subTitle: Medical Practitioner Dashboard
projectList.description: A secure web portal for doctors featuring real-time patient queue management, e-prescriptions, and medical history visualization.

projectList.title: Rakkar Digital
projectList.subTitle: Institutional Web & CMS
projectList.description: Full-stack corporate platform for a digital asset custodian. Developed using Nuxt.js for optimized performance, SEO, and dynamic content management via a custom CMS.

projectList.title: Dessert (Senior Project)
projectList.subTitle: Psychology-Based Dating App
projectList.description: Capstone project: A native Android app using smart matching algorithms and psychology-based scoring. Features real-time chat, geolocation, and ML Kit integration.

projectList.title: Movie Discovery
projectList.subTitle: Architecture Study (MVVM)
projectList.description: Technical exploration of MVVM design patterns using LiveData, Room, and RxJava for efficient data paging and content discovery.

projectList.title: PaperNote
projectList.subTitle: Smart Utility App (MVP)
projectList.description: Implementing MVP design pattern with Firestore integration and ML Kit for intelligent text recognition and digital note-taking.

projectList.title: Todo App
projectList.subTitle: Modern Android Practices
projectList.description: Local data persistence implementation using Room and Coroutines, following MVVM architecture for clean code separation.

projectList.title: Library Progress Dialog
projectList.subTitle: Open-Source Android Library
projectList.description: A custom Android UI library developed to simplify progress dialog implementations for native mobile developers.

projectList.title: GG Live Clone
projectList.subTitle: Real-time Sports Analytics
projectList.description: Implementation of a live sports analytics platform, focusing on reactive state management and live data synchronization using Riverpod.

projectList.title: BIGO Clone
projectList.subTitle: Video Streaming Research
projectList.description: Technical research on low-latency live broadcasting and audience interaction using Agora.io within the Flutter environment.

projectList.title: CleanHome & Ecommerce Clones
projectList.subTitle: UI/UX & Flow Research
projectList.description: Study of complex UI flows, including calendar integration and end-to-end shopping checkout processes.

projectList.title: Party Haan Clone
projectList.subTitle: Technical Assessment
projectList.description: A clone application developed for a technical evaluation, focusing on pixel-perfect UI and efficient state management with Provider.

projectList.title: Intern Workshop Series
projectList.subTitle: Hardware & Utility Labs
projectList.description: Experimental workshop covering SQLite, QR code scanning, Biometric authentication, and PDF generation.

projectList.title: Minesweeper
projectList.subTitle: Logic & State Game
projectList.description: Classic game logic implementation focusing on efficient UI re-rendering and recursive algorithms in Flutter.

projectList.title: Google Ads Tutorials
projectList.subTitle: AdMob Integration Study
projectList.description: Technical research on mobile monetization strategies and Google AdMob implementation in Flutter.

projectList.title: Covid19 Tracker
projectList.subTitle: Data Visualization Lab
projectList.description: Real-time tracking application using API integration to visualize global pandemic data with Bloc.
